title: Great Basin National Park: Ranger Programs
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Ranger Programs              Ranger Programs         NPS Photo  Lehman Caves Tours Lehman Caves is a beautiful limestone cave ornately decorated with stalactites, stalagmites, helictites, flowstone, popcorn, and over 300 rare shield formations. Join a ranger for a Grand Palace or Lodge Room Tour and learn about the history and geology of this unique cave. Click here for more details on cave tours, including ticket prices and tour times.          Great Basin's Night Sky NPS PHOTO  Astronomy Programs Join a park ranger for evening under the beautiful dark skies of Great Basin National Park. These events are scheduled every Tuesday, Thursday, and Saturday night in the summer and most Saturdays in spring and fall.  Please see our Astronomy page for details.        A ranger leads a program for children. NPS  We offer several other programs throughout the week. Rangers present programs for all ages at the Lehman Caves Visitor Center at 2:00 almost daily. Check with the front desk to confirm.
